title: Looking for T210 Jones, Yaeger, and Kelly (mascot)...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: Looking for T210 Jones, Yaeger, and Kelly (mascot)...
posts.post_content:
I'm sure some of you gents reading this post own one or more of these and are just reading it because you're curious. This time of year, they say it is better to give than to receive.  Here's your opportunity.  :D

I am able to purchase these cards outright or have a fairly nice grouping of cards that I am willing to trade if there is something in particular you are looking for. Please send me a PM if interested. Thank you.  :)
I just sent a Kelly Mascot to "love of the game auction".  Look for it in February if your still looking for one then.
